h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter
content: If you see him hold his sword to the side but one sword high up behind his back, it means he's going to charge at you at a very fast speed. Dodge to the side, but then be ready for a second dash to come soon after requiring you to dodge once more. Try dodging alongside his second dash or lure him into a corner, and you'll find time to hit him while he resets himself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - First Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
If you see him hold his sword to the side but one sword high up behind his back, it means he's going to charge at you at a very fast speed. Dodge to the side, but then be ready for a second dash to come soon after requiring you to dodge once more. Try dodging alongside his second dash or lure him into a corner, and you'll find time to hit him while he resets himself.
